attributes.action: Stop Rape being used by TV Broadcasting Companies as a form of entertainment.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament to review with TV Broadcasting Companies the reason why there has been an increase in Rape scenes in mainstream TV and why this is being used as a form of entertainment.
attributes.background: Government to safe guard Rape victims. To support victims with their recovery and not having to subject Rape victims to viewing scenes of Rape, and Rape being used as a from of entertainment in programming. This is demeaning and impacts on the recovery of Rape victims.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding on broadcasting content. 

You might like to raise the issue with Ofcom - https://www.ofcom.org.uk/home
